mapper.select: SELECT b.vendorId,sum(a.lastWeekConsume) lastWeekConsume FROM ( SELECT a.apiId,sum(a.totleCost) lastWeekConsume FROM qyfinance.ApiCostDayCount a WHERE DATE_FORMAT(a.consuTime,'%x-%v')=DATE_FORMAT(date_sub(sysdate(),interval 1 week),'%x-%v') GROUP BY a.apiId ) a LEFT JOIN qyfinance.finance_Api b ON a.apiId = b.id GROUP BY b.vendorId

SELECT b.vendorId,sum(a.lastMonthConsume) lastMonthConsume FROM ( SELECT a.apiId,sum(a.totleCost) lastMonthConsume FROM qyfinance.ApiCostDayCount a WHERE DATE_FORMAT(a.consuTime,'%Y-%m')=DATE_FORMAT(date_sub(sysdate(),interval 1 week),'%Y-%m') GROUP BY a.apiId ) a LEFT JOIN qyfinance.finance_Api b ON a.apiId = b.id GROUP BY b.vendorId

SELECT b.vendorId,sum(a.currMonthConsume) currMonthConsume FROM ( SELECT apiId,sum(totleCost) currMonthConsume FROM qyfinance.bkvwApiCostDayCount WHERE consuTime >= #{currMonthTime} GROUP BY apiId ) a LEFT JOIN qyfinance.finance_Api b ON a.apiId = b.id GROUP BY b.vendorId

SELECT b.vendorId,sum(a.currDayConsume) currDayConsume FROM ( SELECT apiId,sum(b.cost) currDayConsume FROM qydata.ApiRequestLog a INNER JOIN qydata.ApiResponseLog b ON a.id = b.requestLogId WHERE b.createTime >= #{currDayTime} AND b.ok=1 AND b.isMock=0 GROUP BY a.apiId ) a LEFT JOIN qyfinance.finance_Api b ON a.apiId = b.id GROUP BY b.vendorId
SELECT distinct(vendorId) id,vendorName name FROM qyfinance.bkvwApi
SELECT name FROM qyfinance.finance_ApiVendor WHERE id = #{vendorId}
